hindi_videos.name: hindi_news
hindi_videos.title: TO BE REPLACED - Hindi News Content
hindi_videos.description: PLACEHOLDER - Need to find actual Hindi news video
hindi_videos.note: REQUIRES MANUAL SEARCH - Find Aaj Tak, NDTV, or Zee News Hindi content

english_only.note: Can immediately run experiment with 3 English videos (20+ minutes total)

manual_steps: 1. Go to YouTube and search 'Physics Wallah chemistry Hindi'
2. Find a 4-6 minute video with captions
3. Copy the URL and replace PLACEHOLDER_1
4. Search 'Aaj Tak Hindi news' for news content
5. Find a 3-5 minute news clip with captions
6. Copy the URL and replace PLACEHOLDER_2
7. Update the titles and channels accordingly

dataset_strategy.phase_1: Use 3 verified English videos to test the speed optimization framework
dataset_strategy.phase_2: Manually add 2-3 Hindi videos by searching YouTube directly
dataset_strategy.fallback: If Hindi videos are hard to find, run English-only experiment first to validate the approach
